transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir sorry wo call disconnect ho gaya tha aapse baat ho rahi thi na sir abhi.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir main wohi bol rahi thi Asif Ali karke client ka name hai aapke ye ye inquiry aapne abhi recently consume kari thi sir matlab 14 tarikh ko aapne last buylead yahi consume kari hai aur isse isse aapki koi baat hui sir ek inquiry aur thi wooden key holder ye aapko location ye aa raha hai Joshi Math India Mr Arvinder karke aa rahe hain sir.
Customer: Arvinder isse baat hui sir aapki.
Customer: Nahi do logo se nahi teen logo se meri baat hui ek tha Uttarakhand ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Koi Mahipal ya Satpal Singh tha aur ek banda Kerala ka tha aur ek hamare Gujarat ka tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Lekin wo just unhone 100 likha hai lekin just wo ek ya do piece pe fir unka baat ho gaya tha.
Hm hm.
Customer: To to fir deal to done nahi hui maine hold pe hi rakha hai unka ek do piece ke liye main dekhta hu pehle.
Executive: Ji ji sir dekho do matlab thik hai sir but dekho ek to sir hum aap sochiye 17 mein se hum 98 aate hue hain aur usme bhi agar hum sab buyers se connect nahi kar payenge na sir to kahin na kahin sir aap batao usme result utna achcha nahi aa payega aapse agar sir aap daily basis pe thoda sa time portal ko dena start kar de jaise agar main abhi bhi check kar rahi hu na sir aapki buylead section mein aap matlab aap to all over India hi deal kar rahe ho to aap India pe jaake agar recent lead mein dekhoge na sir abhi jaise matlab agar main business use mein bhi dekhti hu inquiry to aap dekh sakte ho sir kai matlab thousand pieces wooden key chain holder ki inquiry Kerala se available hai six hooks mein aur ye haan ji.
Customer: Kerala ka wahi problem hai na product agar wo 200 quantity bhi rakhte hain to bhi unka transportation product se jyada ho jata hai.
Executive: Thousand pieces bhi deliver nahi kar payenge sir.
Customer: Thousand itna to order wo denge hi nahi denge just 100.
Executive: Sir aap ek baar baat to karke dekhe na sir matlab aap to agar buylead use nahi kar rahe to waise bhi dekhiye sir point to aapka left ho hi jayega na day wala to aap isse better hai aap ek baar baat kar lijiye sir kya pata baat ho aur aapko order usse unse ho jaye sir aap ek baar buylead main line pe hi hu aap chahe to consume karke buyer ko connect kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Kerala ki already baat ki hui hai maine shayad ye dusra naya wala hoga ye maine dekha nahi hoga.
Hm.
Executive: Sir ye wali lead available hai ek aapko 100 pieces ki Telangana se hai aapko available hai aur aapko aaj ki bata rahi hu sir thousand pieces ki nine aaj before Delhi se aapko ek available buylead hai sir dekho aapke package ke according aapko on an average daily ki one or two buylead consume karni hai agar aap daily basis pe portal pe aake sir man lijiye aapko 10 inquiry visible ho rahi hai unme se aapko agar ek bhi kam ki lagti hai aur aap unko daily consume karke baat kar lenge na wahin se lead manager ke through call back aur reply kar loge sir aapka aadha kam khatam ho jayega matlab sir main ye nahi bol rahi hu har inquiry mature hogi agar aap agar mahine mein aapko matlab 10 bhi buyer achche milte hain sir aur 10 mein se agar aapko do se teen order bhi nikal jate hain sir to aap khud samjhie sir agar mahine ke teen order hain to saal ke aapko matlab kitne order honge sir 36 hai aur kahin na kahin sir jo IndiaMART pe aap paisa laga rahe ho wo aapka recover ho jayega sir lekin thoda sa sir aapki end se bhi matlab support rehta hai sir hum log to karte hi hain agar aapko sir inquiry galat aa rahi hai ya catalog update karana hai us tarike ki agar koi problem hai account manager se support nahi mil raha to wo hum aapko thik karke denge but sir ye wali jo cheez hai koi problem hi nahi tha wo main usme best chal raha hai usme koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: But sir dekho kahin na kahin jo buyers se baat karna hai follow up lena hai sir wo to aap hi ke end se hoga kyuki sir aapka product hai aap better jante hain hai na to wo to aapke end se hoga sir.
Customer: Par isme problem kya hota hai ki agar out of state hai ya fir kahin door ka hai to just wo direct wholesale mein nahi dete ye aur direct wo ya to pehle sample mangayenge fir uske baad process hoti hai lekin tab tak unka to searching chalu hi rehta hai na IndiaMART ka bhi aisa hai nahi ki just mere se unhone connect kiya hai to unka agar koi pass mein pass mein koi dealer mil jata hai to wo waha chale jate hain.
Hm hm.
Executive: Sir main samajh rahi hu aapki baat dekho har buyer sir mature hone wala nahi hoga.
Executive: Isi ke liye to maine bola sir ki agar hum do logo se on an average dekhiye sir hafte ki aapko 34 leads milti hai hai na sir 34 ka bhi agar main matlab aap socho 34 mein se main aisa to nahi bol rahi hu na sir ki 34 34 buyer aap convert kar payenge main to aapko bahut roughly bol rahi hu ki mahine mein agar teen se char buyer bhi aapko waise mil jate hain jinse aapka kam ho jata hai to wo kahin na kahin fruitful ho sakta hai sir hamare liye aur sir aap agar check karoge na key holders mein aisa nahi hai ki aapki product line mein suppliers listed nahi hai ya competitive product line nahi hai aap check kar lijiye sir agar main ye particular products ko check kar rahi hu IndiaMART pe to is product mein achcha khasa competition bhi hai log logo ne TrustSeal and above services bhi le rakhi hai sir to main aapse bhi wohi request kar rahi hu sir ki agar aapne services ko liya hua hai to please thoda sa aap sir jaise matlab daily basis pe thoda sa portal ko login karna start karo sir daily ka ek se do buyleads select karke filter use karke aap click check karo definitely sir usme se aapko kuch na kuch conversion aa jayega sir.
Customer: Nahi main waisa hi karta hu kyuki mujhe bhi pata hai ki din ki do hi lead milti hai to mujhe jo best lagti hai main us pe hi select karta hu.
Executive: Baki sir dekho jo follow up hai wo bhi aap matlab wahin se turant hi buyer ko follow karo sir aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says deal not done, kept on hold.

- Customer says transportation cost is high.

- Customer says buyers connect with nearby dealers.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to connect with buyers daily.

- Executive suggested to use filters to find leads.

- Executive explained benefits of IndiaMART subscription.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, buyers
